to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Together these proteins give the artery its strength and flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 這些蛋白質聯手提供了動脈的強度及弓單性。
匪徒們聯手在上半場拿到了15分。

sentences.english: This advertising slight-of-hand is called associative conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 這些輕微聯手的廣告被稱爲聯合效應。

sentences.english: Win-win co-operation with Guangzhou Port Group to create a beautiful water exhibition together.
sentences.chinese: 強強聯手與廣州港集團共同打造華麗水上展區。

sentences.english: The military and civil authorities are working together to put down the unrest.
sentences.chinese: 軍政和民政當局正聯手鎮壓動亂。

sentences.english: The Mon Calamari and the Quarren joined together to fight back against the invaders.
sentences.chinese: 蒙卡拉馬里人與誇潤人聯手回擊了入侵者。

sentences.english: She'd feel like we're ganging up with her.
sentences.chinese: 她會認爲我們是聯手對付她。

sentences.english: ChengJun call appointment dao Yin, speak to the idea of together.
sentences.chinese: 成俊打電話約見道賢，說出想聯手的想法。

sentences.english: The police and the people join to combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方與羣衆聯手與犯罪行爲做鬥爭。

sentences.english: The British have also experimented with social-innovation funds.
sentences.chinese: 英國也曾經與社會創新基金會聯手實踐。

sentences.english: The park can be regarded as strong school partnership together.
sentences.chinese: 這次園校合作可稱得上是強強聯手。

sentences.english: Also only then collaborates the Sino-Japanese Europe, US can continue to play eldest child's role.
sentences.chinese: 也只有聯手中日歐，美國才能繼續發揮老大的作用。

sentences.english: Toge ther these proteins give the artery its strength and flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 這些蛋白質聯手提供了動脈的強度及彈性。

sentences.english: They are working together to challenge the Pakistani state.
sentences.chinese: 他們聯手協作，共同挑戰巴基斯坦國。

sentences.english: Politicians have joined hands and completely plundered this country to the brink of destruction.
sentences.chinese: 政客聯手徹底掠奪國家，使國家到了破產的邊緣。
